questions.question: How large is your existing network of people who know you?
questions.subtext: Consider social media connections, email contacts, past clients, and professional relationships

options.label: Large Network (500+)
options.description: Substantial existing relationships you can tap into

options.label: No Existing Network
options.description: Starting from scratch with lead generation

questions.question: How much time can you dedicate to lead generation daily?
questions.subtext: Realistic daily time commitment for outreach, content creation, or ads management

questions.question: What marketing budget can you allocate per month?
questions.subtext: Include paid ads, tools, software, and potential losses during testing phase

options.label: $5,000+ Monthly
options.description: Significant budget for testing and scaling

options.label: $100-$1,000 Monthly
options.description: Minimal budget for small tests or tools

questions.question: How comfortable are you with direct 1-on-1 outreach?
questions.subtext: This includes DMing, emailing, or calling people directly

options.label: Very Comfortable - Love It
options.description: Enjoy personal conversations and relationship building

options.label: Comfortable - Can Do It
options.description: Willing and able to reach out consistently

options.label: Uncomfortable But Willing
options.description: Will push through discomfort if needed

questions.question: How confident are you creating valuable content regularly?
questions.subtext: Posts, videos, emails, articles that provide value to your audience

options.label: Confident - Learning Curve
options.description: Can create content with some practice

questions.question: How comfortable are you with technical tools?
questions.subtext: Ads platforms, landing page builders, tracking pixels, analytics

options.label: Very Comfortable - Technical Person
options.description: Tech-savvy, can learn new platforms quickly

options.label: Comfortable - Can Figure It Out
options.description: Willing to learn with tutorials and support

options.label: Basic Skills - Need Guidance
options.description: Can handle simple tools but need hand-holding

options.label: Not Comfortable - Prefer Simple
options.description: Technology is intimidating, need simple solutions

questions.question: What stage is your business in?
questions.subtext: Understanding your business maturity helps recommend the right strategy

options.label: Established - Proven Offer
options.description: Product-market fit validated, ready to scale

options.label: Pre-Launch - Validating Idea
options.description: Still testing if people will pay

questions.question: How strong are your 1-on-1 sales or conversion skills?
questions.subtext: Ability to have conversations that convert leads into paying customers

options.label: Moderate - Can Convert Some
options.description: Hit or miss, working on improving

questions.question: How quickly do you need to generate leads?
questions.subtext: Some strategies work faster than others

options.label: ASAP - Need Leads Now
options.description: Urgent need for immediate lead flow

questions.question: How do you feel about spending money to test and learn?
questions.subtext: Some strategies require upfront investment with uncertain returns during testing

options.label: Moderate - Small Tests Okay
options.description: Willing to test with small amounts

options.label: No Tolerance - Free Only
options.description: Cannot afford to lose any money
